amendment.description: Amendment requires the Energy Department to transmit to Congress a report on "activities of the executive branch to address high gasoline prices and to develop an overall national energy strategy".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to require the Energy Department to transmit to Congress a report on "activities of the executive branch to address high gasoline prices and to develop an overall national energy strategy".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kingston amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
